title: The Hunting Party Trailer: Melissa Roxburgh Searches for Escaped Prisoners in NBC Crime Drama — Watch
description: Melissa Roxburgh is tracking down criminals as an ex-FBI agent in NBC’s The Hunting Party. The network dropped a new teaser trailer Saturday for the upcoming crime drama, which premieres on Monday, Feb. 3 at 10/9c. In it, the Manifest alum plays Rebecca “Bex” Henderson, a former government operative searching for inmates who escaped from […]
author: Claire Franken
excerpt: NBC has released a teaser trailer for 'The Hunting Party,' its forthcoming crime drama starring Melissa Roxburgh — watch.
text: The Hunting Party Trailer: Melissa Roxburgh Searches for Escaped Prisoners in NBC Crime Drama — WatchMelissa Roxburgh is tracking down criminals as an ex-FBI agent in NBC‘s The Hunting Party. The network dropped a new teaser trailer Saturday for the upcoming crime drama, which premieres on Monday, Feb. 3 at 10/9c. In it, the Manifest alum plays Rebecca “Bex” Henderson, a former government operative searching for inmates who escaped from a top-secret prison after a mysterious explosion. Per the official logline, the series follows Bex and “a small team of investigators who are assembled to track down and capture the most dangerous killers our country has ever seen.” Joining Roxburgh is Josh Mackenzie (La Brea) as Shane Florence, a former solider and current prison guard; Sara Garcia (The Flash) as Jennifer Morales, an intel officer and major in the Army; Patrick Sabongui (The Flash) as CIA agent Ryan Hassani; and Nick Wechsler (Revenge) as Oliver Odell, Bex’s former partner. The Hunting Party hails from series creator JJ Bailey, who also wrote the pilot episode. Bailey will serve as co-showrunner alongside Jake Coburn (co-creator of NBC’s The Endgame). Hit PLAY on the teaser above and then hit the comments with your first impressions of The Hunting Party.
html:
The Hunting Party Trailer: Melissa Roxburgh Searches for Escaped Prisoners in NBC Crime Drama — Watch

Melissa Roxburgh is tracking down criminals as an ex-FBI agent in NBC‘s The Hunting Party.

The network dropped a new teaser trailer Saturday for the upcoming crime drama, which premieres on Monday, Feb. 3 at 10/9c. In it, the Manifest alum plays Rebecca “Bex” Henderson, a former government operative searching for inmates who escaped from a top-secret prison after a mysterious explosion.

Per the official logline, the series follows Bex and “a small team of investigators who are assembled to track down and capture the most dangerous killers our country has ever seen.”

Joining Roxburgh is Josh Mackenzie (La Brea) as Shane Florence, a former solider and current prison guard; Sara Garcia (The Flash) as Jennifer Morales, an intel officer and major in the Army; Patrick Sabongui (The Flash) as CIA agent Ryan Hassani; and Nick Wechsler (Revenge) as Oliver Odell, Bex’s former partner.

The Hunting Party hails from series creator JJ Bailey, who also wrote the pilot episode. Bailey will serve as co-showrunner alongside Jake Coburn (co-creator of NBC’s The Endgame).

Hit PLAY on the teaser above and then hit the comments with your first impressions of The Hunting Party.
